components.description:
A reddish-orange face with furrowed eyebrows, tongue stuck out, and beads of sweat, as if overheated from high temperatures. Number and position of sweat droplets vary by platforms. May also represent physical attractiveness (slang, hot).

Most platforms feature expressions that are variations on ðŸ˜° Anxious Face With Sweat or ðŸ˜¥ Sad but Relieved Face.
components.title: Overheated Face

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.
